widget.description: Generates Adsense for the vertical areas. Available Adsense types: Button (125x125),Skyscraper (120x600),Small Square (200x200),Wide Skyscraper (160x600)

setting.name: PUBLISHER ID
setting.info: The publisher id of your google adsense account.

setting.name: BORDER COLOR
setting.info: Fill in the color code, without the "#" sign.

setting.name: TITLE COLOR
setting.info: Fill in the color code, without the "#" sign.

setting.name: BACKGROUND COLOR
setting.info: Fill in the color code, without the "#" sign.

setting.name: TEXT COLOR
setting.info: Fill in the color code, without the "#" sign.

setting.name: URL COLOR
setting.info: Fill in the color code, without the "#" sign.

setting.name: EMBED
setting.info: Whatever Google Adsense code you paste here, will completely overwrite all the settings.

widget.author: PhpLD
